typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SalesLT
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DimCustomer
SalesLT derive(CreatedHash = sha1(FirstName+LastName+CompanyName),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, DimCustomer exists(CreatedHash == HashKey,
	negate:true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, DimCustomer lookup(SalesLT@CustomerID == DimCustomer@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 derive(InsertedDate = iif(isNull(InsertedDate), currentTimestamp(), InsertedDate),
		UpdatedDate = currentTimestamp(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(upsertIf(true()),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		InsertedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp,
		HashKey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CustomerID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesLT@CustomerID,
		Title = SalesLT@Title,
		FirstName = SalesLT@FirstName,
		MiddleName = SalesLT@MiddleName,
		LastName = SalesLT@LastName,
		InsertedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		HashKey = CreatedHash
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
